00036 class uvm_component;

00038 typedef enum {
00039   UVM_SC_STOP,
00040   UVM_NO_SC_STOP
00041 } stop_mode_enum;
00042 
00043 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 //
00045 // CLASS: uvm_manager
00046 //
00047 // Internal implementation class.
00048 // Stores global settings, and implements most of the global functions.
00049 // A singleton instance of this class is created for a given simulation run.
00050 //
00051 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 
00058 class uvm_manager {
00059 public:
00060 
00061   friend class uvm_component;
00062 
00063   static uvm_manager* get_manager();
00064  
00065   void set_stop_mode(stop_mode_enum mode = UVM_SC_STOP);
00066 
00067   void set_global_timeout(sc_core::sc_time t);
00068   void set_global_stop_timeout(sc_core::sc_time t);
00069   
00070   void stop_request();
00071 
00072   uvm_component* find_component(const char* name);
00073   uvm_component* find_module(const char* name);
00074   std::vector<uvm_component*> find_all(const char* name = ".*");
00075   std::vector<uvm_component*> find_all_module(const char* name);
00076 
00077   unsigned int get_num_tops();
00078   void set_top(sc_core::sc_module* comp);
00079   std::vector<sc_core::sc_module*> get_tops();
00080   std::vector<uvm_component*>      get_uvm_component_tops();
00081 
00082 protected:
00083 
00084   uvm_manager();
00085   ~uvm_manager();
00086 
00087   void wait_for_global_timeout();
00088   void wait_for_stop_timeout();
00089 
00090   void stop_spawner();
00091   void spawn_stop(sc_core::sc_module* mod);
00092   void end_run_phase();
00093 
00094   void do_kill_all();
00095   void do_kill(sc_core::sc_module* mod);
00096   
00097   void do_extract_all();
00098   void do_extract(sc_core::sc_module* mod);
00099   
00100   void do_check_all();
00101   void do_check(sc_core::sc_module* mod);
00102   
00103   void do_report_all();
00104   void do_report(sc_core::sc_module* mod);
00105 
00106 protected:
00107 
00108   static uvm_manager* m_mgr;
00109          
00110   stop_mode_enum                   m_stop_mode;

00112   sc_core::sc_time                 m_stop_timeout;
00113   sc_core::sc_join                 m_join_stop;

00115 };
